content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (56.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 56.0, -62.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have all required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, the Burner Mining Drill requires iron plates and iron gear wheels, which could not be crafted due to missing materials.
  
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it. For instance, a Stone Furnace could not be placed at (55.5, -62.5) because it was not available in the inventory.

### Errors when using crafting machines
- Make sure to insert the necessary items into the crafting machine before attempting to craft. The Stone Furnace requires iron ore to smelt into iron plates, which must be inserted before crafting can occur.

### Errors when extracting items
- Move to the target entity from which you want to extract items before attempting to extract. For example, ensure you are positioned correctly when extracting from the Stone Furnace.
